heading: Aspect of Burning Rage â€“ Diablo 4 Legendary Aspect
content: Aspect of Burning Rage is a Barbarian Offensive Aspect that can only be found from random drops. Unlike Codex Aspects you can't go run a Dungeon to unlock this and will have to rely on RNG. Legendary Aspects can change the way skills and builds work in significant ways.
